comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Bush Terminal, now known as Industry City, is a historic intermodal shipping, warehousing, and manufacturing complex on the waterfront in the Greenwood Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York City. Bush Terminal was the first facility of its kind in New York and the largest multi-tenant industrial property in the United States. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bush_Terminal_%E2%80%93_Industry_City
